name: CIImageAccumulator
desc: An object that manages feedback-based image processing for tasks such as painting or fluid simulation.

items.name: init?(extent: CGRect, format: CIFormat)
items.desc: Initializes an image accumulator with the specified extent and pixel format.

items.name: init?(extent: CGRect, format: CIFormat, colorSpace: CGColorSpace)
items.desc: Initializes an image accumulator with the specified extent, pixel format, and color space.

items.name: func setImage(CIImage)
items.desc: Sets the contents of the image accumulator to the contents of the specified image object.

items.name: func setImage(CIImage, dirtyRect: CGRect)
items.desc: Updates an image accumulator with a subregion of an image object.

items.name: var extent: CGRect
items.desc: The extent of the image associated with the image accumulator.

items.name: var format: CIFormat
items.desc: The pixel format of the image accumulator.

items.name: func image() -> CIImage
items.desc: Returns the current contents of the image accumulator.

items.name: func clear()
items.desc: Resets the accumulator, discarding any pending updates and the current content.
